review: I have bilateral sciatica and nabumetone taken at the recommended dosage on the bottle is ineffective for anything. Pathetic.
I'm on Nabumetome 750mg BID and I get absolutely no relief!

Relafen (nabumetone):My doctor prescribed this twice a day for a month after receiving a steroid injection for a herniated disc at the L5,S1. It works great! I can now walk, sit, stand, etc. Whereas I couldn't while suffering from Sciatica.  I'm only 30! I have had no side effects.

Relafen (nabumetone):I have not experienced any side effects whatsoever.  I take 1500 mgs every night after supper.  I went from not sleeping due to pain in my right leg to sleeping the whole night through.  Also, I had become so stiff it was hard getting up and down out of chairs and out of the car.  With this medicine, I am up and down like a normal 40 year old, rather than an 80 year old.  I am so very grateful for this medicine.
Taking 500mg in the morning and late afternoon, I haven't had any benefits.
Relafen (nabumetone):A good initial substitute for ibuprofen to keep symptoms at a minimum.
